verses.verse: Woe<WH1945> to her that is filthy<WH4754> and polluted,<WH1351> to the oppressing<WH3238> city!<WH5892>
She obeyed<WH8085> not the voice;<WH6963> she received<WH3947> not correction;<WH4148> she trusted<WH982> not in the LORD;<WH3068> she drew not near<WH7126> to her God.<WH430>
Her princes<WH8269> within<WH7130> her are roaring<WH7580> lions;<WH738> her judges<WH8199> are evening<WH6153> wolves;<WH2061> they gnaw<WH1633> not the bones<WH1633> till the morrow.<WH1242>
Her prophets<WH5030> are light<WH6348> and treacherous<WH900> persons:<WH582> her priests<WH3548> have polluted<WH2490> the sanctuary,<WH6944> they have done violence<WH2554> to the law.<WH8451>

The just<WH6662> LORD<WH3068> is in the middle<WH7130> thereof; he will not do<WH6213> iniquity:<WH5766> every morning<WH1242> does he bring<WH5414> his judgment<WH4941> to light,<WH216> he fails<WH5737> not; but the unjust<WH5767> knows<WH3045> no<WH3808> shame.<WH1322>

I have cut<WH3772> off the nations:<WH1471> their towers<WH6438> are desolate;<WH8074> I made their streets<WH2351> waste,<WH2717> that none<WH1097> passes<WH5674> by: their cities<WH5892> are destroyed,<WH6658> so that there is no<WH1097> man,<WH376> that there is none<WH369> inhabitant.<WH3427>

I said,<WH559> Surely<WH389> you will fear<WH3372> me, you will receive<WH3947> instruction;<WH4148> so their dwelling<WH4583> should not be cut<WH3772> off, howsoever<WH3605> <WH834> I punished<WH6485> them: but they rose<WH7925> early,<WH7925> and corrupted<WH7843> all<WH3605> their doings.<WH5949>

Therefore<WH3651> wait<WH2442> you on me, said<WH5002> the LORD,<WH3068> until the day<WH3117> that I rise<WH6965> up to the prey:<WH5706> for my determination<WH4941> is to gather<WH622> the nations,<WH1471> that I may assemble<WH6908> the kingdoms,<WH4467> to pour<WH8210> on them my indignation,<WH2195> even all<WH3605> my fierce<WH2740> anger:<WH639> for all<WH3605> the earth<WH776> shall be devoured<WH398> with the fire<WH784> of my jealousy.<WH7068>

For then<WH227> will I turn<WH2015> to the people<WH5971> a pure<WH1305> language,<WH8193> that they may all<WH3605> call<WH7121> on the name<WH8034> of the LORD,<WH3068> to serve<WH5647> him with one<WH259> consent.<WH7926>
From beyond<WH5676> the rivers<WH5104> of Ethiopia<WH3568> my suppliants,<WH6282> even the daughter<WH1323> of my dispersed,<WH6327> shall bring<WH2986> my offering.<WH4503>

In that day<WH3117> shall you not be ashamed<WH954> for all<WH3605> your doings,<WH5949> wherein<WH834> you have transgressed<WH6586> against me: for then<WH227> I will take<WH5493> away<WH5493> out of the middle<WH7130> of you them that rejoice<WH5947> in your pride,<WH1346> and you shall no<WH3808> more<WH3254> <WH5750> be haughty<WH1361> because of my holy<WH6944> mountain.<WH2022>
I will also leave<WH7604> in the middle<WH7130> of you an afflicted<WH6041> and poor<WH1800> people,<WH5971> and they shall trust<WH2620> in the name<WH8034> of the LORD.<WH3068>

The remnant<WH7611> of Israel<WH3478> shall not do<WH6213> iniquity,<WH5766> nor<WH3808> speak<WH1696> lies;<WH3576> neither<WH3808> shall a deceitful<WH8649> tongue<WH3956> be found<WH4672> in their mouth:<WH6310> for they shall feed<WH7462> and lie<WH7257> down,<WH4769> and none<WH369> shall make them afraid.<WH2729>
Sing,<WH7442> O daughter<WH1323> of Zion;<WH6726> shout,<WH7321> O Israel;<WH3478> be glad<WH8056> and rejoice<WH5937> with all<WH3605> the heart,<WH3820> O daughter<WH1323> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>

The LORD<WH3068> has taken<WH5493> away<WH5493> your judgments,<WH4941> he has cast<WH6437> out your enemy:<WH341> the king<WH4428> of Israel,<WH3478> even the LORD,<WH3068> is in the middle<WH7130> of you: you shall not see<WH7200> evil<WH7451> any more.<WH5750>
In that day<WH3117> it shall be said<WH559> to Jerusalem,<WH3389> Fear<WH3372> you not: and to Zion,<WH6726> Let not your hands<WH3027> be slack.<WH7503>

The LORD<WH3068> your God<WH430> in the middle<WH7130> of you is mighty;<WH1368> he will save,<WH3467> he will rejoice<WH7797> over<WH5921> you with joy;<WH8057> he will rest<WH2790> in his love,<WH160> he will joy<WH1523> over<WH5921> you with singing.<WH7440>
I will gather<WH622> them that are sorrowful<WH3013> for the solemn<WH4150> assembly,<WH4150> who are of you, to whom<WH5921> the reproach<WH2781> of it was a burden.<WH4864>

Behold,<WH2005> at that time<WH6256> I will undo<WH6213> all<WH3605> that afflict<WH6031> you: and I will save<WH3467> her that halts,<WH6761> and gather<WH6908> her that was driven<WH5080> out; and I will get<WH7760> them praise<WH8416> and fame<WH8034> in every<WH3605> land<WH776> where they have been put to shame.<WH1322>

At that time<WH6256> will I bring<WH935> you again, even in the time<WH6256> that I gather<WH6908> you: for I will make<WH5414> you a name<WH8034> and a praise<WH8416> among all<WH3605> people<WH5971> of the earth,<WH776> when I turn<WH7725> back<WH7725> your captivity<WH7622> before your eyes,<WH5869> said<WH559> the LORD.<WH3068>
